definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt

sentences.english: This shop is an exclusive porcelain shop.
sentences.chinese: 這家商店是磁器專賣店。

sentences.english: Welcome to Giant store, I can provide with any help?
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨捷安特專賣店，我能爲您做些什麼？

sentences.english: She makes bow ties manually in the evening to sell at her own brand store, Winz.
sentences.chinese: 她晚上會做一些手工領結拿到自己的品牌專賣店賣。

sentences.english: It has also been boosted by new Asian stores and weak sterling.
sentences.chinese: 新開設的亞洲專賣店和疲軟的英鎊也助推了它的增長。

sentences.english: Nine new franchised stores opened, including seven in China.
sentences.chinese: 在九家新開張的專賣店中，中國佔了七家。

sentences.english: The kimono had to be picked up at the boutique.
sentences.chinese: 但必須親自去到那家專賣店才能拿到和服。

sentences.english: And now, YakPak's large roster of boutique customers dependably receive their small-lot orders.
sentences.chinese: 公司的客戶裏也包括許多小型的服裝專賣店。

sentences.english: They step into a speciality store.
sentences.chinese: 她們走進了一家專賣店。

sentences.english: Jotun Multicolor Paints Centre, supplies a variety of hardware, building materials and electrical products.
sentences.chinese: 家庭五金專賣店，提供各種工具用品，建築及電動。

sentences.english: You can buy it in our golf pro-shop.
sentences.chinese: 您可以到我們的高爾夫球專賣店購買。

sentences.english: One startup that successfully used this technique was a high-end women's clothing boutique.
sentences.chinese: 成功採用該技法的新企業是一家高檔女裝專賣店。

sentences.english: Where is franchised store of Fu Ding City Kuang Wei in?
sentences.chinese: 福鼎匡威的專賣店在哪裏？

sentences.english: Third, Apple finally opened up Apple stores in China.
sentences.chinese: 第三，蘋果最終在中國開設了專賣店。

sentences.english: I'm sorry we don't. This is a franchised store with fixed prices.
sentences.chinese: 不好意思，我們是專賣店，統一價，不打折。

sentences.english: Other jobs assigned by the corner sales manager or the sales coordinator.
sentences.chinese: 專賣店店長或者銷售協調員分配的任務。

sentences.english: Three Stones Kites Company is one of the well-known companies that produce kites at present.
sentences.chinese: 三石齋風箏專賣店是目前中國最有名的風箏廠家之一。

definition: brick and mortar business/physical (rather than online) retail store
shop, firm, or brand of merchandise with a long-established reputation
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
